snippet.title: Throwback Thursdays - Clock Tower 3 Livestream
snippet.description:
Getting in the spooky mood for Halloween, Yuri and Greg took a look back at eerie PlayStation 2 classic "Clock Tower 3." Evade murderous villains and heal tortured souls to put them at peace. An interesting game well ahead of its time in its sparseness of combat, procedural scares, and regenerating health (or "Panic") system.

"Haunting Ground" video to follow! 

Subscribe to the Official Capcom Unity Channel: 
http://bit.ly/Qjb2MV
